thread.title: Save more than 70% on a BBQ hamper with Great British BBQ and Westin Gourmet
thread.title_full: Save more than 70% on a BBQ hamper with Great British BBQ and Westin Gourmet - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save more than 70% on a BBQ hamper with Great British BBQ and Westin Gourmet
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with BBQ specialists Great British BBQ and their meat partners Westin Gourmet to bring readers a fantastic offer for their summer BBQs. The luxury 28 piece steak hamper contains: 2 x 6-7oz Matured, Grass Fed Beef Fillet Steaks 2 x 6-7oz Matured, Grass Fed Beef Sirloin Steaks 4 x 6-7oz Matured, Grass Fed Beef Rump Steaks 2 x 6-7oz Matured, Grass Fed Beef Pave Steaks 2 x 4oz Matured, Grass Fed Minute Steaks 4 x 4oz Matured Grass Fed Wagyu Steak Burgers 4 x 4oz Matured Grass Fed, Steak Burgers 6 x Great Taste Award Winning, British Cumberland Sausages 2 x £5 Westin Gourmet Vouchers The hamper is worth £121.17 but Telegraph readers can order it for just £35.00 plus £4.95 delivery, saving a huge £86.17. How to Claim: To claim this exclusive offer, click here For expert BBQ cooking tips and reviews of the latest grills and gadgets, visit the Great British BBQ website here telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
